name: ShoppingScout
tag_list: food-shopping, groceries, savings, grocery-app, price-comparison, grocery-shopping
overview:
ShoppingScout is the first local price comparison app for grocery.

We make it easy to save money on your grocery shopping. By simply showing you the best prices on products you buy every week, we hope to save your family 20% on grocery purchases.

**We are closing our public beta and launching a whole new site in the coming weeks based on feedback from our users.

With our simple list building tool you can create a list in seconds with real products, prices and stores in your neighborhood. Share special dietary lists with friends or engage with the community in a discussion about the best deals on whatever you buy. Discover new products, send a family member out to shop your list with ease and be confident that you are getting the most out of your grocery budget. Simplify your life by getting your grocery list out of your head and into our app. Know before you go with ShoppingScout.
